subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Though he wanted to avoid Game 7 against the Pistons, LeBron James has remained focused on winning it. He and his Cleveland Cavaliers are getting their chance right now in Detroit.
snippet: Though he wanted to avoid Game 7 against the Pistons, LeBron James has remained focused on winning it. He and his Cleveland Cavaliers are getting their chance right now in Detroit.
